home.title: Track Navigator | Sports and Leisure Route Planner
home.description: Track Navigator is your sports and leisure route planner. Create and explore hiking, cycling, and travel routes, including points of interest such as fountains, rest areas, and shops.
home.keywords: tracknavigator, track-navigator, track navigator, route planner, sports routes, leisure routes, openstreetmap, create routes with waypoints, hiking, cycling

app.title: App | Track Navigator
app.description: Access the Track Navigator app and create routes with waypoints and points of interest. Easily and freely plan your hiking, cycling, or Camino de Santiago routes.
app.keywords: tracknavigator, track-navigator, track navigator, sports routes app, route planner, openstreetmap, waypoints, angular seo, hiking, cycling, Camino de Santiago

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Track Navigator
faq.description: Find answers to your questions about Track Navigator: how to plan hiking, cycling, or Camino de Santiago routes, add points of interest, and contribute to OpenStreetMap.
faq.keywords: tracknavigator, track-navigator, track navigator, faq track navigator, route planner questions, openstreetmap help, sports routes faq, hiking, cycling, Camino de Santiago

about.title: About Me | Anartz Mugika Ledo
about.description: I am Anartz Mugika Ledo, creator of Track Navigator and open-source web developer with free projects for the running, cycling, and travel communities.
about.keywords: tracknavigator, track-navigator, track navigator, anartz mugika ledo, track navigator creator, open source developer, free projects, runners, cyclists, travelers

demos.title: Route Examples | Track Navigator
demos.description: Explore demo routes with Track Navigator, ideal for hiking, cycling, and the Camino de Santiago, including water fountains, rest areas, and shops along each route.
demos.keywords: tracknavigator, track-navigator, track navigator, track navigator examples, sports routes openstreetmap, route planner demos, hiking, cycling, Camino de Santiago

default.title: Tutorials | Track Navigator
default.description: Discover Track Navigator tutorials to learn how to plan hiking, cycling, or Camino de Santiago routes.
default.keywords: tracknavigator tutorials, sports route guide, hiking tutorial, cycling tutorial, Camino de Santiago tutorial

basic.title: Basic Tutorial | Track Navigator
basic.description: Learn the essentials to create your first routes with Track Navigator.
basic.keywords: tracknavigator basic tutorial, create routes, hiking, cycling

basic-in-video.title: Basic Video Tutorial | Track Navigator
basic-in-video.description: Learn how to upload generated routes with all waypoints, even overcoming the 25-waypoint limit.
basic-in-video.keywords: wikiloc tracknavigator, import wikiloc routes, hiking, cycling

devices.title: Loading Files on Devices | Track Navigator
devices.description: Learn how to add the files generated in the app to your devices so you can use them during training or leisure outings.
devices.keywords: coros tracknavigator, load routes, running, garmin track navigator, suunto tracknavigator, hiking, cycling

kml.title: Downloading in KML Format | Track Navigator
kml.description: Learn how to download your routes with Points of Interest (POIs) in KML format from Track Navigator to use them on other devices and applications.
kml.keywords: kml tracknavigator, download kml routes, export kml routes, points of interest, hiking kml, cycling kml, Camino de Santiago kml

wikiloc.title: Wikiloc Tutorial | Track Navigator
wikiloc.description: Learn how to upload generated routes with all waypoints, even overcoming the 25-waypoint limit.
wikiloc.keywords: wikiloc tracknavigator, import wikiloc routes, hiking, cycling
